chargeHist.descr: Operate with Restricted Controlled Substance (2nd w/ Pass)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Morgan Lee Sandona was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Injury by Use/Vehicle-Control. Substance, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.25(1)(am).
  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: Payable out of 25% of inmate funds while incarcerated, balance as a condition of community supervision.

May not vote or serve on a jury until civil rights are restored.
No firearms

Def must submit DNA sample on 10-19-15
Enter into, participate in and successfully complete any assessments, evaluations and/or treatment programs as directed by the agent.

May not be in any establishment whose primary purpose is the sale of alcohol.
Maintain absolute sobriety: No possession or consumption of alcohol, illegal drugs, intoxicating substances, or any other controlled substances without a valid prescription. All prescriptions must be approved by agent.
No contact with known drug users, drug sellers, or places known where drugs can be obtained illegally.
$1,700 bond from 15CF43 to be applied. Remainder to be payable out of 25% of inmate funds while incarcerated, balance as a condition of community supervision.

Defendant Morgan Lee Sandona in court with attorney Bradley J. Schraven.  Defendant Morgan Lee Sandona in custody.  Allen R Brey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
2:30pm
Court is being heard
Court questions additional charges
DA spks
DA spks on sentencing
Atty Schraven spks on sentencing
Def addresses the court
Court imposes:
Ct 1: 6 years initial confinement, 5 years extended supervision. 147 days credit. Not eligible for CIP or SAP. Consecutive to 15CF43
Remit costs, except Dna surcharge
Pay restitution $2,543.51- $1,700 bond from 15CF43 to be applied. Balance due as condition of community service, may take up to 25% of prison monies
Def must give Dna sample on 10-19-15
24 months DL rev- concurrent to 15CF43
AODA
Ct 4: 2 years initial confinement, 2 years extended supervision. Not eligible for CIP or SAP. Concurrent to ct 1.
May not be in any establishment whose primary purpose is the sale of alcohol.  
Enter into, participate in and successfully complete any assessments, evaluations and/or treatment programs as directed by the agent.
Maintain absolute sobriety: no possession or consumption of alcohol, illegal drugs, intoxicating substances, or any other controlled substances without a valid prescription. All prescriptions must be approved by agent.
No contact with known drug users, drug sellers, or places known where drugs can be obtained illegally.
Def remains in custody for transportation
Appeal rights
from DA to Court - providing copy of State Crime Lab report (also provided to Atty Schraven)

Defendant Morgan Lee Sandona (in custody) in court with attorney Bradley J. Schraven. Prosecuting Atty Allen R Brey appeared for State of Wisconsin.

Ct calls case w/15CF43

Ct accepts waiver and Def bound over for trial
DA presents/files Information
DA is heard on agreement, re: 15CF43 plead to Ct 1, dismiss & read-in Ct 2 & 3, re: 15CF118 plead to Ct 1 & 4, dismiss & read-in Ct 2 & 3
Recommendation for PSI in each case
Atty Schraven agrees
DA reads Ct 1 (15CF43)
Ct arraigns Def on Ct 1, Def pleads No contest
DA reads Ct 1 (15CF118)
Ct arraigns Def on Ct 1, Def pleads No contest
DA reads Ct 4 (15CF118)
Ct arraigns Def on Ct 4, Def pleads No Contest
Ct reviews restitution information
Ct orders Defs blood results be entered into file
Ct reviews maximum penalties to each count
No threats or promises
Elements of offense
Def acknowledges responsibility of each count, #15CF43 Ct 2 & 3, #15CF118 Ct 2 & 3
Clerk to enter pleas

Exh #1 lab results, received
Ct accepts pleas and finds Def guilty on each count #15CF43 Ct 1 & #15CF118 Ct 1 &4, dismissed & read-in #15CF43 Ct 2 & 3 & #15CF118 Ct 2 & 3
PSI ordered

Ct revokes bail on each case

Order for defendant to abstain from alcohol and for testing

No operation of motor vehicle
